remarks: Value of the subcategory subset relation when the arguments are known functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
isssc.1 $e |- ( ph -> H Fn ( S X. S ) ) $.
isssc.2 $e |- ( ph -> J Fn ( T X. T ) ) $.
isssc.3 $e |- ( ph -> T e. V ) $.
isssc $p |- ( ph -> ( H C_cat J <-> ( S C_ T /\ A. x e. S A. y e. S ( x H y ) C_ ( x J y ) ) ) ) $.
$d H x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d S x y $.
